## What is LINE?

LINE is a popular messaging app and social media platform that was created by NHN Japan in 2011. The app is widely used in Asian countries, including Japan, Taiwan, Thailand, and Indonesia, and has over 186 million monthly active users worldwide.

### Messaging

One of the core features of LINE is messaging. Users can send text messages, stickers, emojis, and multimedia files to their friends and family. LINE also has a unique feature called "Hidden Chat," which allows users to set an expiration time for messages, so they disappear after a specified amount of time.

### Voice and Video Calls

LINE also offers voice and video call functionality. Users can make calls to other LINE users for free, regardless of their location. Additionally, LINE also offers a paid service called "LINE Out," which allows users to make calls to landlines and mobile phones.

### Social Networking

Another unique feature of LINE is its social networking capabilities. Users can create a profile and connect with their friends, celebrities, and brands. LINE also offers a timeline feature, which allows users to share photos, videos, and status updates with their contacts.

### Additional Features

LINE also offers a range of other features, including:

- Group chats
- News and weather updates
- Games and digital stickers
- Public accounts for businesses and brands
- Online shopping and payment services

## Is LINE Safe?

LINE takes user security and privacy seriously. The app uses end-to-end encryption for all messages and calls, ensuring that only the sender and receiver can read or listen to the content. Additionally, LINE also offers "Letter Sealing," which adds an extra layer of protection to messages by encrypting them on the device and decrypting them only when the recipient opens the message.

## Conclusion

LINE is a versatile app with a wide range of features that make it a popular choice for messaging, calling, and social networking. With its focus on user privacy and security, it's no wonder why millions of people trust and rely on LINE for their communication needs.
